translation.en: [man] The Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum…
translation.it: Quello all'Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum

translation.en: was a… art thief's delight.
translation.it: fu un furto davvero memorabile.

translation.en: Everybody talks about the Gardner.
translation.it: Tutti parlano del Gardner.

translation.en: This is… this is it.
translation.it: Beh, eccoci qui.

translation.en: The biggest art theft in the history of the world.
translation.it: Il più grande furto d'arte della storia.

translation.en: Millions of dollars' worth of artwork.
translation.it: Milioni di dollari in opere d'arte.

translation.en: They disappeared.
translation.it: Scomparse.

translation.en: Somebody had to know something.
translation.it: Qualcuno doveva sapere qualcosa.

translation.en: [man 2] Every reporter in this town eventually did something on that heist.
translation.it: A un certo punto, ogni giornalista della città ne parlò.

translation.en: We were all hitting our sources saying, "What's up?"
translation.it: Contattavamo le nostre fonti per avere informazioni.

translation.en: People didn't seem to know.
translation.it: Ma nessuno sapeva nulla.

translation.en: [man 3] The crime occurred in 1990 on St. Patty's Day.
translation.it: Il crimine avvenne nel 1990, nel giorno di San Patrizio.

translation.en: Whatever drunken revelry was occurring across the city, who knows?
translation.it: Di certo fu una notte di bagordi tra ubriachi.

translation.en: Happy St. Patty's Day.
translation.it: Felice San Patrizio!

translation.en: [man 3] But it was a good time to commit a crime.
translation.it: Ma era un buon momento per un crimine.

translation.en: [woman 1] With this case, it is really Boston's biggest unsolved mystery,
translation.it: Questo caso è senza dubbio il più grande mistero irrisolto di Boston,

translation.en: in addition to being the largest art heist in the world.
translation.it: nonché il più grande furto d'arte al mondo.

translation.en: Everybody has a theory.
translation.it: Ognuno ha la sua teoria.

translation.en: The people that did it…
translation.it: I responsabili…

translation.en: maybe they're dead.
translation.it: magari sono morti.

translation.en: Maybe some who were involved are still alive.
translation.it: O forse alcuni sono ancora vivi.

translation.en: When I start to think about the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum
translation.it: Se penso all'Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum…

translation.en: and the drama and the obsession with getting the paintings back
translation.it: BOSTON LATIN SCHOOL, CLASSE 1991 …e alla gravità del fatto, all'ossessione di ritrovare i dipinti…

translation.en: and the whole obsession around everything,
translation.it: …e alla gravità del fatto, all'ossessione di ritrovare i dipinti…

translation.en: I keep talking about it because it's fascinating to me,
translation.it: Continuo a parlarne perché lo trovo affascinante,

translation.en: because I was there.
translation.it: perché io c'ero.

translation.en: [Clougherty] I was a witness.
translation.it: Ero una testimone.

translation.en: [Clougherty] That night, I had plans to meet friends.
translation.it: Quella sera incontrai degli amici.

translation.en: It was quiet on Palace Road.
translation.it: C'era silenzio, in Palace Road.

translation.en: The street's very dark…
translation.it: La strada era molto buia,

translation.en: just lit by this really faint amber glow from the streetlights.
translation.it: illuminata solo dal debole bagliore dei lampioni.

translation.en: We were outside the building and I asked my friend Justin,
translation.it: Eravamo fuori dall'edificio e chiesi al mio amico Justin

translation.en: "Can you give me a piggyback ride?" Jumped on,
translation.it: di farmi salire sulla sua schiena.

translation.en: and we started walking down the street.
translation.it: Così iniziammo a camminare per strada.

translation.en: [Stratman] We're goofing around, we'd had beers,
translation.it: Facevamo gli stupidi, avevamo bevuto un po'.

translation.en: and I noticed that this car has its running lights on. We're coming from behind it.
translation.it: Poi notai quest'auto con le luci accese. Noi arrivavamo da dietro.

translation.en: When I get up close to it, I see that there are people in it.
translation.it: Avvicinandomi, vidi che dentro c'erano delle persone.

translation.en: [Clougherty] Two men in the front seats.
translation.it: Due uomini sui sedili anteriori.

translation.en: [Stratman] There's a glare from a streetlamp,
translation.it: C'era il riflesso del lampione,

translation.en: but I can see the shoulder of a policeman's uniform.
translation.it: ma riconobbi lo stemma di un'uniforme della polizia.

translation.en: Boston police uniform, it's got a sort of distinctive keystone shape.
translation.it: Quello della polizia di Boston ha una forma particolare.

translation.en: [Clougherty] When we saw the officer,
translation.it: Quando vedemmo i poliziotti,

translation.en: thinking at that time that they had come to end the party,
translation.it: pensammo che fossero lì per interrompere la festa,

translation.en: our feeling was, "Let's just go."
translation.it: quindi ce ne andammo.

translation.en: I do remember that the car was parked… right next to the Gardner Museum.
translation.it: Ma ricordo che l'auto era parcheggiata proprio accanto al Gardner Museum.

translation.en: I probably wouldn't have remembered this night… [chuckles]
translation.it: Probabilmente ora non mi ricorderei di quella notte

translation.en: …if it hadn't been for what happened later.
translation.it: se non fosse per quanto successe dopo.

translation.en: [man 1] The biggest art heist in history.
translation.it: Il più grande furto d'arte della storia.

translation.en: Boston, a quiet museum, a daring robbery.
translation.it: Boston, un museo tranquillo, un'audace rapina.

translation.en: [man 2] Vipers are in the grass and are moving towards you.
translation.it: Le vipere tra l'erba sono pronte ad attaccare.

translation.en: [man 3] The 13 art treasures stolen are worth a half a billion dollars.
translation.it: I 13 tesori rubati valgono mezzo miliardo di dollari.

translation.en: Take a look at these composite drawings.
translation.it: Guardate questi identikit.

translation.en: [man 4] I have the paintings with me. Now what?
translation.it: Ho i quadri con me. E adesso?

translation.en: [man 5] Easy to use as international currency.
translation.it: Si usano come valuta internazionale.

translation.en: [woman 1] Japan.
translation.it: Giappone.

translation.en: -[man 2] France. -[man 5] Dublin.
translation.it: - Francia. - Dublino.

translation.en: [man 6] Saudi Arabia. I know that's where they went.
translation.it: Arabia Saudita. Sono lì di sicuro.

translation.en: [woman 2] These paintings were a get-out-of-jail-free card, and everybody knew it.
translation.it: I quadri potevano farti uscire di prigione e lo sapevano tutti.

translation.en: [man 7] How are those paintings gonna get people out of prison?
translation.it: Come possono far uscire qualcuno di prigione?

translation.en: What are we talking about this shit for?
translation.it: Ma di che stiamo parlando?

translation.en: [woman 2] Who could carry off something like this?
translation.it: Chi potrebbe averlo fatto?

translation.en: [man 5] Italian mob or Irish mob.
translation.it: La mafia italiana o irlandese.

translation.en: -How you doing? -Good.
translation.it: - Come va? - Bene.

translation.en: [man 4] Everybody is whacked.
translation.it: Sono tutti morti.

translation.en: [woman 2] There's murders on both sides, it's violent.
translation.it: Omicidi da entrambe le parti, una cosa violenta.

translation.en: -[explosion] -Jesus!
translation.it: Cristo!

translation.en: As long as you didn't do anything, you got nothing to worry about.
translation.it: Se non hai fatto niente, non hai di che preoccuparti.

translation.en: [woman 1] I had no idea what I was going into.
translation.it: Non sapevo cosa aspettarmi.

translation.en: It was just horrifying.
translation.it: Fu semplicemente terribile.

translation.en: [man 8] For now, the empty frames are all that remain on the museum walls.
translation.it: Per ora, le cornici vuote sono tutto ciò che resta nel museo.

translation.en: [Anne Hawley] With works of art,
translation.it: Le opere d'arte

translation.en: they're only works of art because you're interacting with them.
translation.it: sono tali solo se c'è qualcuno a interagire con esse.

translation.en: I mean, they can't exist without you.
translation.it: Non possono esistere senza di noi.

translation.en: I was the director of the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum
translation.it: Fui la direttrice dell'Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum…

translation.en: from 1989 to 2016,
translation.it: DIRETTRICE EMERITA …dal 1989 al 2016,

translation.en: and the first woman to be a director.
translation.it: nonché la prima donna a ricoprire la carica.

translation.en: The museum had become inward-looking.
translation.it: Il museo si era chiuso in se stesso.

translation.en: It hadn't connected deeply to the community.
translation.it: Non c'era un vero legame con la comunità.

translation.en: So, I was brought in to bring the museum back to life, was sort of my charge.
translation.it: Quindi mi assunsero per farlo rifiorire. Era quello il mio compito.

translation.en: [Shelley Murphy] I grew up in Dorchester. I went to South Boston High School.
translation.it: Sono cresciuta a Dorchester. Ho frequentato il liceo di South Boston.

translation.en: And the first time I went, I fell in love with the place.
translation.it: La prima volta che andai al museo, me ne innamorai.

translation.en: I had been through all the galleries
translation.it: Visitai tutte le gallerie…

translation.en: and I can remember so vividly The Storm on the Sea of Galilee.
translation.it: GIORNALISTA …e mi ricordo bene Cristo nella tempesta sul mare di Galilea.

translation.en: Loving that one in particular.
translation.it: Adoravo quello in particolare.

translation.en: This is gonna make me sound like a wicked snob, and I'm not.
translation.it: Ora sembrerò uno snob, che non sono. COLONNISTA

translation.en: It's sort of like the MFA in Boston was like the Louvre,
translation.it: Ma è come se l'MFA di Boston fosse il Louvre

translation.en: and the Gardner Museum was like the d'Orsay.
translation.it: e il Gardner Museum fosse il d'Orsay.

translation.en: So pretentious, I can't believe I said it.
translation.it: Dio, che pretenziosità.

translation.en: Has more character. Put it that way.
translation.it: Ha più carattere. Mettiamola così.

translation.en: [Hawley] It's such a beautiful environment that you go to another place.
translation.it: È un ambiente così meraviglioso che ti trasporta in un altro mondo.

translation.en: I like to call it the "a-ha" moment
translation.it: Io amo definirlo il momento "a-ha!"

translation.en: or the epiphanic moment, which is a little too heady to say.
translation.it: o momento epifanico, che suona un po' troppo da intellettuali.

translation.en: It's built to echo a Renaissance Venetian palace.
translation.it: Vuole richiamare i palazzi veneziani del Rinascimento.

translation.en: It's very plain on the outside.
translation.it: Da fuori è molto semplice.

translation.en: You're just shocked when you come inside to this verdant, luscious courtyard
translation.it: Ma entrando si rimane sconvolti dal cortile verdeggiante

translation.en: that is at the center of the museum,
translation.it: al centro del museo

translation.en: and all the galleries on every floor surround it.
translation.it: e da tutte le gallerie che lo circondano.

translation.en: And then every gallery…
translation.it: Poi, ogni galleria…

translation.en: has its own theme.
translation.it: ha un suo tema.

translation.en: It's probably one of the most extraordinary creations by an individual anywhere.
translation.it: È una delle più straordinarie creazioni ideate da una sola mente.

translation.en: When Isabella Stewart Gardner built the museum, she broke ground in 1899.
translation.it: Isabella Stewart Gardner iniziò a costruire il museo nel 1899,

translation.en: There was nothing here.
translation.it: quando non c'era nulla.

translation.en: It was a swamp.
translation.it: Era una palude.

translation.en: And when she died, she left her infamous will.
translation.it: E quando morì, lasciò il suo famigerato testamento.

translation.en: She said that if anything were permanently changed,
translation.it: Se qualunque cosa fosse stata cambiata in modo permanente,

translation.en: the collection should be crated, shipped to Paris for auction,
translation.it: la collezione sarebbe dovuta andare all'asta a Parigi

translation.en: and the money should go to Harvard University.
translation.it: e il ricavato devoluto all'università di Harvard.

translation.en: She was an eccentric in a world where being eccentric
translation.it: Era un'eccentrica in un mondo in cui l'eccentricità era un modo per emanciparsi.

translation.en: was a way of getting out of the house for women.
translation.it: in un mondo in cui l'eccentricità era un modo per emanciparsi. SCRITTRICE

translation.en: [Vigderman] I believe she was flirtatious.
translation.it: Credo fosse alquanto maliziosa.

translation.en: She didn't mind being a little sexy.
translation.it: Non le dispiaceva essere sensuale.

translation.en: And she dressed to show it off.
translation.it: E lo mostrava nel vestire.

translation.en: Which, you know, wasn't part of the time.
translation.it: Cosa decisamente rara, a quei tempi.

translation.en: Before the museum was open, she wanted to test the acoustics,
translation.it: Prima dell'apertura del museo, voleva verificare l'acustica

translation.en: but you have to have people in the room listening to the music.
translation.it: e, per farlo, occorrono delle persone che ascoltino la musica.

translation.en: But she didn't want anybody to see the place.
translation.it: Ma lei non voleva mostrare il museo a nessuno.

translation.en: She was connected to the Perkins School for the Blind…
translation.it: Aveva delle conoscenze nella Perkins School for the Blind,

translation.en: and she had the blind children come in
translation.it: così fece venire i bambini ciechi

translation.en: and be the bodies listening to the music to test the acoustics.
translation.it: ad ascoltare la musica per controllare l'acustica.

translation.en: You know, it's not a museum.
translation.it: Non è un museo.

translation.en: It was her work of art.
translation.it: È il suo capolavoro.

translation.en: It's an architectural spectacle.
translation.it: Uno spettacolo architettonico.

translation.en: [Karen Sangregory] To this day, I still have dreams about the Gardner Museum.
translation.it: Ad oggi, continuo a sognare il Gardner Museum.

translation.en: All of that stuff really seeped in.
translation.it: È davvero una parte di me. EX GUARDIA

translation.en: As a gallery guard, we had all this time to spend
translation.it: In quanto guardie, avevamo il tempo di apprezzare profondamente la collezione.

translation.en: intimate time with the collection.
translation.it: avevamo il tempo di apprezzare profondamente la collezione.

translation.en: There's no downside to working in a Venetian palace.
translation.it: Lavorare in un palazzo così non ha lati negativi. Era stupendo.

translation.en: It was just beautiful.
translation.it: EX CAPO DELLA SICUREZZA

translation.en: We had the Titian Rape of Europa.
translation.it: Avevamo il Ratto di Europa di Tiziano.

translation.en: We had the Raphael,
translation.it: Raffaello,

translation.en: And it was just that whole environment.
translation.it: Era tutto l'ambiente nel suo insieme.

translation.en: To feel like you could reach out and touch something from that long ago.
translation.it: Sembrava di potersi allungare e toccare qualcosa di estremamente antico.

translation.en: Here I am, staring at the actual marks made by the actual hand
translation.it: Eccomi qui a osservare le vere pennellate tracciate dalla vera mano

translation.en: of this guy when he was, like, my age.
translation.it: di questo tizio quando aveva la mia età.

translation.en: You just can't get any better than that.
translation.it: Meglio di così non si può.

translation.en: [Aaron Fannin] If you got the call to work overnight shift, you were happy to do it.
translation.it: Quando mi chiamavano per fare il turno di notte, ero contento.

translation.en: It was kind of a treat.
translation.it: Era un piacere. "Bello, posso restare tutta la notte."

translation.en: You were like, "Cool. I get to go stay all night."
translation.it: Era un piacere. "Bello, posso restare tutta la notte." EX GUARDIA

translation.en: All the lights in the museum were off, and you just had your flashlight and a walkie-talkie.
translation.it: Tutte le luci erano spente, avevo solo la torcia e il walkie-talkie.

translation.en: You'd do your round, walk through the museum.
translation.it: Facevo la ronda, camminando per il museo.

translation.en: It was pretty spooky.
translation.it: Faceva un po' paura.

translation.en: And then you'd sit at the desk…
translation.it: Poi mi sedevo alla scrivania…

translation.en: and wait for something to happen.
translation.it: e aspettavo che succedesse qualcosa.

translation.en: And… nothing ever happened.
translation.it: E… non succedeva mai nulla.

translation.en: [Heidorn] That's the problem of the night watch.
translation.it: È questo il problema della sorveglianza notturna.

translation.en: Day after day, week after week, year after year of nothing happening.
translation.it: Per giorni, settimane, anni, non succede assolutamente niente.

translation.en: Just absolute benign-- Nothing happening.
translation.it: Calma pura. Niente di niente.

translation.en: And then March 18th, 1990.
translation.it: Poi arrivò il 18 marzo 1990.

translation.en: [reporter] Today is Sunday, March 18th, 1990. A beautiful day in South Boston.
translation.it: Oggi è domenica 18 marzo 1990. Una bellissima giornata a South Boston.

translation.en: Now, as the parade gets underway, it's 48 degrees.
translation.it: Ora, all'inizio della parata, abbiamo circa 9 gradi

translation.en: We'll see a high of 52 and clear skies.
translation.it: e una massima prevista di 12.

translation.en: [Cullen] St. Patrick's Day in Boston,
translation.it: A Boston, per San Patrizio,

translation.en: the day itself,
translation.it: durante la giornata in sé,

translation.en: I'd call it just a drinking day.
translation.it: più che altro si beve.

translation.en: People'd be drinking all day, rolling into Saturday, then right into Sunday.
translation.it: La gente beve tutto il giorno, per tutto il fine settimana.

translation.en: And Boston has its parade on Sunday. It's not on the 17th.
translation.it: A Boston, la parata è di domenica. Non il 17.

translation.en: The parade in Boston is confined to South Boston.
translation.it: La parata rimane nella zona di South Boston.

translation.en: It draws in hundreds of thousands of people from outlying areas.
translation.it: Attira centinaia di migliaia di persone dalle zone circostanti.

translation.en: The other thing, it would attract an enormous police presence.
translation.it: Oltre alla gente, attira anche molta polizia.

translation.en: But in the area where the museum is,
translation.it: PERCORSO DELLA PARATA Ma l'area dove si trova il museo è tranquilla, in genere.

translation.en: it's generally quiet.
translation.it: Ma l'area dove si trova il museo è tranquilla, in genere.

translation.en: [Sangregory] It was a total normal day.
translation.it: Era una giornata normalissima.

translation.en: Just coming in to work on Sunday morning in my role
translation.it: Andai al lavoro la domenica mattina per sostituire i due ragazzi del turno di notte

translation.en: to replace the two guys that would've been there all night
translation.it: per sostituire i due ragazzi del turno di notte

translation.en: at the alarm control center desk.
translation.it: al centro di controllo.

translation.en: Normally, one or both of them would be in there and they would buzz us in.
translation.it: Di norma c'era uno di loro o entrambi e ci aprivano la porta.

translation.en: Nothing like that was happening.
translation.it: Non accadde niente di simile.

translation.en: There was no response, this was completely unprecedented and very odd.
translation.it: Nessuna risposta, il che era davvero strano.

translation.en: Too much time is passing.
translation.it: Stava passando troppo tempo.

translation.en: So, I called the chief of security and told him we couldn't get in.
translation.it: Quindi chiamai il capo della sicurezza, spiegando che non potevamo entrare.

translation.en: He said, "I'm coming in."
translation.it: Lui disse: "Va bene, arrivo".

translation.en: He took us around some kind of a back door.
translation.it: Ci fece fare il giro, fino a una specie di porta sul retro.

translation.en: As soon as we got in there,
translation.it: Quando entrammo,

translation.en: you just knew something is really, really wrong.
translation.it: sapevamo che era capitato qualcosa di terribile.

translation.en: The security cameras had been turned,
translation.it: Le telecamere erano state girate,

translation.en: the office door had been busted.
translation.it: la porta dell'ufficio era spalancata.

translation.en: There was a frame in there.
translation.it: Dentro c'era una cornice.

translation.en: It was like, "Oh."
translation.it: Pensai: "Oh".

translation.en: And there was a crowbar leaning against the wall.
translation.it: E c'era un piede di porco appoggiato alla parete.

translation.en: The chief hands me the crowbar.
translation.it: Il capo mi passò il piede di porco.

translation.en: He's like, "Here, hold this!"
translation.it: Disse: "Tieni questo!"

translation.en: And so I'm holding this crowbar and my mind is thinking, "This is part of the scene of the crime, right?
translation.it: Io lo tenevo in mano e pensavo: "Fa parte della scena del crimine, no?

translation.en: This is evidence. My hand prints… My hand prints are on this crowbar!"
translation.it: È una prova. Ci sono sopra le mie impronte!"

translation.en: And then my next thought was,
translation.it: Dopodiché pensai:

translation.en: "He gave me this so that I can pummel someone with it."
translation.it: "Me l'ha dato per potermi difendere".

translation.en: It's like I went in with this open vision and curiosity, like,
translation.it: Ero entrata con questo sguardo aperto e una gran curiosità, tipo…

translation.en: And then it just, like… [whooshes]
translation.it: Ma poi…

translation.en: shrunk down really fast.
translation.it: la cosa finì molto in fretta.

translation.en: And then it was like, "Where's the guys? Where's the guys?"
translation.it: Pensavo: "Dove sono i ragazzi?"

translation.en: And then the next thought was,
translation.it: E poi:

translation.en: "Are the bad guys still here?"
translation.it: "I criminali sono ancora qui?"

translation.en: He picks up the phone and called the Boston police.
translation.it: Il collega prese il telefono e chiamò la polizia.

translation.en: It seemed like all he could say was,
translation.it: Tutto ciò che riuscì a dire fu:

translation.en: "I'm calling from the Gardner. [panting] We've got big trouble. We've got big trouble."
translation.it: "Chiamo dal Gardner Museum. Siamo in guai davvero grossi".

translation.en: [Hawley] Must have been about eight o'clock.
translation.it: Saranno state le 8:00.

translation.en: We had some friends come over for breakfast
translation.it: Avevamo degli amici a casa per colazione

translation.en: when I got the phone call from the security director.
translation.it: quando il direttore della sicurezza mi chiamò.

translation.en: And he said, "There's been a theft and you need to come right now."
translation.it: Disse: "C'è stato un furto. Deve venire subito".

translation.en: To me, it felt instantaneous. Like, the street was lined with cars.
translation.it: Accadde tutto molto in fretta. La strada era punteggiata di auto.

translation.en: I ended up sitting at the alarm control center.
translation.it: Ero seduta nel centro di controllo.

translation.en: And the police come in, and it was the first order of business
translation.it: La polizia entrò e per prima cosa

translation.en: to plop down this big box of donuts on the counter.
translation.it: posò questa grossa scatola di ciambelle sul tavolo.

translation.en: Right in front of me. Like, "Whoo!"
translation.it: Davanti a me.

translation.en: [Sangregory] They went up and worked their way down.
translation.it: Perlustrarono l'edificio dall'alto verso il basso.

translation.en: No one knows what's going on. We don't know where the guards are yet.
translation.it: Nessuno sapeva cosa stesse succedendo o dove fossero le guardie.

translation.en: I had never done the rounds like the night guards had,
translation.it: Non avevo mai fatto la ronda delle guardie notturne,

translation.en: but I had heard there were tunnels under this building.
translation.it: ma sapevo che sotto l'edificio c'erano delle gallerie.

translation.en: And I'll never forget
translation.it: E non dimenticherò mai

translation.en: this astonished look on the cop's face, and he says,
translation.it: lo sguardo sconvolto dell'agente mentre diceva:

translation.en: "Oh my God.
translation.it: "Oh, santo cielo.

translation.en: If there's a body to be found, it'll be in a tunnel."
translation.it: Se c'è un corpo da trovare, sarà nelle gallerie".

translation.en: As it turned out, the guards were located down in the basement.
translation.it: Venne fuori che le guardie si trovavano nel seminterrato.

translation.en: Tied up in the duct tape and everything.
translation.it: Legate col nastro adesivo e tutto.

translation.en: The day of the robbery was the first and last time I was ever at the Gardner Museum.
translation.it: Il giorno della rapina fu la mia unica volta al Gardner Museum.

translation.en: I was a forensic photographer,
translation.it: Facevo il fotografo forense e l'analista di immagini per l'FBI.

translation.en: and I was also an image analyst for the FBI.
translation.it: Facevo il fotografo forense e l'analista di immagini per l'FBI. EX FOTOGRAFO FORENSE

translation.en: I may have gotten there about 9:15 or so.
translation.it: Sarò arrivato intorno alle 9:15.

translation.en: Those shots there were taken by BPD.
translation.it: Le foto furono scattate dalla polizia.

translation.en: They photographed Rick.
translation.it: GUARDIA N° 1 Fotografarono Rick.

translation.en: Randy was in the other shot.
translation.it: GUARDIA N° 2 E anche Randy.

translation.en: But they seemed to concentrate on Rick and how he was taped up.
translation.it: Ma sembravano più concentrati su com'era stato legato Rick.

translation.en: He was duct taped.
translation.it: Col nastro adesivo.

translation.en: His head and his hair in a roundabout fashion.
translation.it: Tutta la testa e i capelli, come in un cerchio.

translation.en: And then his hands were bound.
translation.it: E anche le mani.

translation.en: Which I thought was kind of odd. They had a little pad.
translation.it: C'era una specie di cuscinetto, che trovai strano.

translation.en: Why would you tape around the head? Why not just put tape on his eyes?
translation.it: Perché mettergli il nastro sulla testa? E non solo sugli occhi?

translation.en: I've seen people who were killed. They were taped.
translation.it: Ho visto vittime di omicidio legate col nastro.

translation.en: But Rick's taping, I never saw anything like that.
translation.it: Ma il caso di Rick era qualcosa di mai visto.

translation.en: I thought that was kind of odd that he was taped in that fashion.
translation.it: Trovai davvero strano il modo in cui era stato legato.

translation.en: We were thinking, "Jeez, if these were any real serious hoods,
translation.it: Pensavamo: "Cavolo, se questi erano veri criminali,

translation.en: why not just kill these people?"
translation.it: perché non ucciderli e basta?"

translation.en: Dead men tell no tales.
translation.it: I morti non parlano.

translation.en: [Hawley] I think I got there around 8:30, maybe, or quarter to 9:00. I can't remember exactly.
translation.it: Sarò arrivata alle 8:30 o alle 8:45. Non ricordo di preciso.

translation.en: The FBI was there,
translation.it: L'FBI era già lì

translation.en: and they wouldn't let me in to any of the galleries,
translation.it: e non volevano farmi entrare in nessuna delle gallerie,

translation.en: so I had no idea what I was going into.
translation.it: quindi non sapevo cosa aspettarmi.

translation.en: And when I got into the galleries, it was just… -[slams door] -…horrifying.
translation.it: Una volta entrata nelle gallerie, fu semplicemente terribile.

translation.en: [Green] When I first entered, I saw the golden frames…
translation.it: Entrato nella stanza, vidi le cornici dorate

translation.en: overlapping one another.
translation.it: accatastate una sull'altra.

translation.en: And you could see that someone had used a knife.
translation.it: Si vedeva che avevano usato un coltello.

translation.en: The paintings weren't unscrewed from the back, they were cut out.
translation.it: I dipinti non furono sfilati da dietro, ma tagliati via.

translation.en: I found that pretty interesting. Why did they cut them?
translation.it: Lo trovai interessante. Perché tagliarli?

translation.en: It wasn't like cutting a piece of paper. As the conservators explained,
translation.it: Non è semplice carta. Come mi spiegarono i restauratori,

translation.en: the paintings are not just one canvas.
translation.it: i dipinti non sono composti da una sola tela.

translation.en: You can't cut them out and then roll them up like blueprints.
translation.it: Non si possono tagliare e arrotolare come delle cianografie.

translation.en: They said it'd be time-consuming and difficult cutting these things.
translation.it: Dissero che tagliarli sarebbe stato lungo e difficile.

translation.en: [Sangregory] We were starting to hear things, like, "What? They just cut this stuff out of the frames?
translation.it: Iniziammo a sentire cose tipo: "Cosa? Li hanno tagliati via dalle cornici?

translation.en: [grunts] Oh my gosh."
translation.it: Santo cielo".

translation.en: It was, and it still is, completely unbelievable.
translation.it: Era, ed è ancora, assolutamente incredibile.

translation.en: It was incomprehensible to me
translation.it: Per me era inconcepibile

translation.en: that even if you were wanting to steal art that you would treat it that way.
translation.it: l'idea di trattare così dei pezzi d'arte, pur volendo rubarli.

translation.en: [Hawley] There were 13 works that were taken altogether.
translation.it: Le opere rubate furono 13.

translation.en: In terms of art historical works,
translation.it: In termini di opere storiche,

translation.en: the most important work lost is the Rembrandt seascape,
translation.it: la più importante era il paesaggio marino di Rembrandt

translation.en: Storm on the Sea of Galilee.
translation.it: Cristo nella tempesta sul mare di Galilea.

translation.en: It's Rembrandt's only seascape,
translation.it: È l'unico paesaggio marino di Rembrandt

translation.en: and that was brutally cut out of the frame.
translation.it: e fu brutalmente tagliato via dalla cornice. OLIO SU TELA

translation.en: As was the Rembrandt portrait of The Lady and Gentleman in Black.
translation.it: Come anche il ritratto di Rembrandt Dama e gentiluomo in nero.

translation.en: That was also cut out of the frame,
translation.it: Anch'esso fu tagliato via

translation.en: and that picture had been altered at some time in the past.
translation.it: e quell'opera era stata modificata, in passato.

translation.en: There was a man and a woman, and a space between them.
translation.it: OLIO SU TELA Tra i due personaggi c'è uno spazio.

translation.en: When they X-rayed it,
translation.it: Ai raggi X,

translation.en: there was a child between the man and the woman.
translation.it: si vede che c'era un bambino tra l'uomo e la donna.

translation.en: Apparently, the child died, and it was too painful,
translation.it: Pare che il bambino morì e fu così doloroso

translation.en: and it was painted out by Rembrandt.
translation.it: che Rembrandt lo rimosse.

translation.en: The Vermeer picture's called The Concert.
translation.it: Poi c'è il Vermeer, Concerto a tre.

translation.en: And you have a woman just about to burst into song.
translation.it: Ritrae una donna sul punto di mettersi a cantare.

translation.en: Vermeer's paintings, there aren't that many. Some say 33, some say 35.
translation.it: Non esistono molti dipinti di Vermeer. Secondo alcuni sono 33, altri dicono 35.

translation.en: For me, that Vermeer was
translation.it: Per me, quel Vermeer era…

translation.en: the toughest one to realize, "Boy, that thing is gone."
translation.it: La sua scomparsa fu la più difficile da elaborare.

translation.en: As a guard,
translation.it: Durante il lavoro,

translation.en: that was one of my favorite pieces to just study.
translation.it: era uno dei pezzi che preferivo osservare.

translation.en: You could just be there and you could just almost like talk to it.
translation.it: Si poteva stare lì e quasi mettersi a parlarci.

translation.en: And then, of course, there was the Flinck,
translation.it: E poi, ovviamente, c'era il Flinck,

translation.en: Obelisk in the Landscape.
translation.it: Paesaggio con obelisco.

translation.en: The Chinese beaker.
translation.it: Il bicchiere cinese.

translation.en: That actually was the oldest work taken.
translation.it: L'opera più antica tra quelle rubate. DINASTIA SHANG

translation.en: Those were the works that were in the Dutch Room,
translation.it: Quelle opere erano nella Sala Olandese… SALA OLANDESE

translation.en: along with an etching of Rembrandt.
translation.it: …insieme a un'incisione di Rembrandt.

translation.en: The Rembrandt self-portrait was also off the wall.
translation.it: Anche il suo autoritratto fu tolto dal muro. "AUTORITRATTO", OLIO SU TAVOLA DI QUERCIA

translation.en: And I thought, "Oh my God, that too?"
translation.it: Pensai: "Cielo, anche quello?"

translation.en: And I pulled the frame out and the picture was still there.
translation.it: Sollevai la cornice e il quadro era ancora lì.

translation.en: Then, from the Short Gallery,
translation.it: Poi, dalla Galleria Piccola…

translation.en: there were five works on paper.
translation.it: …mancavano cinque opere su carta.

translation.en: Degas depicting jockeys riding horses,
translation.it: Un Degas con fantini a cavallo… MATITA, INCHIOSTRO E ACQUERELLO SU CARTA

translation.en: beautifully drawn and executed.
translation.it: …splendidamente eseguito.

translation.en: And then, in that same gallery,
translation.it: E poi, nella stessa galleria,

translation.en: the Napoleonic finial
translation.it: c'era l'ornamento di una bandiera napoleonica.

translation.en: from the Napoleonic flag.
translation.it: c'era l'ornamento di una bandiera napoleonica. ORNAMENTO IN BRONZO ARTISTA SCONOSCIUTO, METALLO DORATO

translation.en: They kinda theorized that that's where probably they were out of time.
translation.it: Si pensa che a quel punto non avessero più tempo.

translation.en: Where they tried to unscrew the finial.
translation.it: Provarono a rimuovere l'ornamento.

translation.en: The, uh, screws were in the cigarette receptacle.
translation.it: Le viti erano nel posacenere.

translation.en: They hadn't gotten through taking all the screws out, so they figured it was time to go,
translation.it: Ma non riuscirono a toglierle tutte e devono aver deciso di andarsene,

translation.en: that these particular items may have just been an afterthought.
translation.it: lasciando perdere quegli oggetti.

translation.en: And then finally, from the first floor, the Blue Room,
translation.it: Infine, dal primo piano, nella Sala Blu,

translation.en: a Manet called Chez Tortoni.
translation.it: presero Da Tortoni, di Manet.

translation.en: [Heidorn] There are significant paintings missing.
translation.it: Mancano alcuni quadri di rilievo.

translation.en: Ballpark figure on the cost is about $200 million.
translation.it: Il valore stimato è di circa 200 milioni di dollari.

translation.en: [Hawley] The FBI didn't have an art squad. Nobody did.
translation.it: L'FBI non aveva una squadra specializzata in arte. Nessuno l'aveva.

translation.en: It was just devastating.
translation.it: Fu devastante.

translation.en: [Hawley] So, they were struggling to get up to speed on it.
translation.it: Facevano fatica a reggere il ritmo.

translation.en: And, of course, we were shattered.
translation.it: E noi, ovviamente, eravamo distrutti.

translation.en: It was like a death in the family.
translation.it: Come un lutto in famiglia.

translation.en: I was just totally numb.
translation.it: Mi sentivo come intorpidita.

translation.en: [Arnold Hiatt] We were told by the FBI
translation.it: L'FBI ci disse

translation.en: we needed to get a reward going before the trail gets cold.
translation.it: che dovevamo proporre una ricompensa prima che la cosa si raffreddasse.

translation.en: That was considered to be the most important move we could make.
translation.it: Era la mossa migliore da fare. EX MEMBRO DEL CONSIGLIO

translation.en: So, I called someone I knew who was in the Philippines at the time.
translation.it: Così chiamai qualcuno che, al tempo, era nelle Filippine. FILIPPINE

translation.en: He was also the chairman of Sotheby's.
translation.it: Era anche il presidente di Sotheby's.

translation.en: "What do you want from me?" he said.
translation.it: Mi chiese cosa volessi.

translation.en: And I told him we needed a million dollars.
translation.it: Gli dissi che ci serviva un milione di dollari.

translation.en: Sotheby's and Christies stepped in,
translation.it: UN MILIONE PER IL RITROVAMENTO DI OPERE INESTIMABILI Sotheby's e Christie's si fecero avanti offrendo un milione di dollari.

translation.en: offering this million-dollar reward.
translation.it: Sotheby's e Christie's si fecero avanti offrendo un milione di dollari.

translation.en: We were just overcome with calls coming in.
translation.it: Fummo sommersi di telefonate.

translation.en: The phone system broke down.
translation.it: L'intero sistema collassò.

translation.en: A group of us were just really around the clock working to get the reward out.
translation.it: Alcuni di noi lavorarono senza sosta per riuscire ad assegnare la ricompensa.

translation.en: I operate under the assumption that we are going to return--
translation.it: Devo agire supponendo che restituiremo…

translation.en: Get these returned, because we are a world-class museum.
translation.it: Recupereremo le opere, perché siamo un museo di prim'ordine.

translation.en: [Hawley] The press was brutal for a while. Just brutal.
translation.it: Per un po', la stampa fu brutale. Davvero brutale.

translation.en: [reporter] How long have you been director?
translation.it: Da quanto è direttrice?

translation.en: For six months.
translation.it: Sei mesi.

translation.en: -[reporter 2] Guards, how old were they? -I don't know.
translation.it: - Quanti anni hanno le guardie? - Non so.

translation.en: -How long have they worked for you? -Do you know? I don't know.
translation.it: - Da quanto lavorano per voi? - Tu lo sai? Non lo so.

translation.en: [reporter 3] What happened?
translation.it: Cos'è successo?

translation.en: Would you say that the guards screwed up in this thing?
translation.it: Secondo lei è stata colpa delle guardie?

translation.en: Or were they taken advantage of?
translation.it: O hanno approfittato di loro?

translation.en: The FBI's handling all of that. We will--
translation.it: Se ne sta occupando l'FBI. Noi…

translation.en: I don't have more to say now,
translation.it: Non ho altro da aggiungere,

translation.en: but we will continually update you if there is any new information.
translation.it: ma continueremo ad aggiornarvi in caso di novità.

translation.en: [Tron Brekke] I was there that morning.
translation.it: Io c'ero, quella mattina.

translation.en: And I think I was maybe the first FBI agent on the scene.
translation.it: Credo di essere stato il primo agente dell'FBI sulla scena. EX CAPO SEZIONE, FBI

translation.en: Boston PD was already there.
translation.it: La polizia era già lì.

translation.en: This was designated as a major theft, and I had responsibility
translation.it: Si trattava di un furto grave e io ero responsabile del programma per i crimini violenti,

translation.en: for the violent crimes program, which included
translation.it: e io ero responsabile del programma per i crimini violenti,

translation.en: kidnappings, bank robberies, fugitives, that type of thing.
translation.it: che includeva rapimenti, rapine in banca, fuggitivi…

translation.en: As I recall, they showed me the security area…
translation.it: Ricordo che mi mostrarono l'area di sicurezza

translation.en: that had been breached.
translation.it: dov'erano entrati.

translation.en: These guys obviously had some idea of what they were doing.
translation.it: I criminali sapevano cosa stavano facendo.

translation.en: I had to sit down with the supervisor of the squad
translation.it: Mi sedetti con il supervisore della squadra

translation.en: that would handle violent crime like this.
translation.it: incaricata della gestione di crimini violenti come questo.

translation.en: We tried to figure out, "What do we do? Who do we look at?
translation.it: Cercammo di stabilire cosa fare, su chi indagare,

translation.en: Where could these things have gone?"
translation.it: dove fossero finite le opere.

translation.en: I only saw the guards briefly upstairs.
translation.it: Vidi le guardie solo brevemente, al piano di sopra.

translation.en: There were other people that were interviewing them…
translation.it: C'erano altre persone che le stavano interrogando

translation.en: in this conference room.
translation.it: nella sala conferenze.

translation.en: I could see on the security camera looked like two cops out there.
translation.it: VOCE DI RICHARD ABATH Dalla telecamera, sembravano due poliziotti.

translation.en: They come to the door, they rang the bell,
translation.it: Suonarono il campanello

translation.en: and they said,
translation.it: e dissero:

translation.en: "Boston Police. We got a report of a disturbance on the premises."
translation.it: "Polizia di Boston. Ci hanno segnalato un problema qui".

translation.en: I buzzed them in.
translation.it: Li feci entrare.

translation.en: They asked me if I was alone,
translation.it: Mi chiesero se ero da solo

translation.en: and I said that no, my partner was off doing a round.
translation.it: e dissi che il mio collega stava facendo la ronda.

translation.en: They said, "Get him down here."
translation.it: Dissero di chiamarlo.

translation.en: The cop turned to me and said, "Don't I know you? Don't I recognize you?
translation.it: Uno mi guardò e disse: "Hai un volto familiare.

translation.en: I think there's a warrant out for your arrest. Can you step out from behind the desk?"
translation.it: Credo ci sia un mandato di arresto per te. Puoi allontanarti dalla scrivania?"

translation.en: And he said, "Up against the wall."
translation.it: Mi fece mettere contro il muro.

translation.en: The guy who was dealing with me was taller and skinny…
translation.it: Quello che parlò con me era più alto e magro.

translation.en: was wearing these gold frame round glasses, if I remember correctly.
translation.it: 30 ANNI, 178 CM, SNELLO Indossava occhiali rotondi dalla montatura dorata, se ricordo bene.

translation.en: He had a mustache.
translation.it: E aveva i baffi.

translation.en: It looked really greasy.
translation.it: Sembravano molto unti.

translation.en: It was probably a fake mustache.
translation.it: Probabilmente erano finti.

translation.en: And he handcuffed me.
translation.it: Poi mi ammanettò.

translation.en: Cuffed my partner.
translation.it: E anche il mio collega.

translation.en: Very dramatically said, "Gentlemen, this is a robbery."
translation.it: Disse in tono teatrale: "Signori, questa è una rapina".

translation.en: [reporter] The FBI released these pictures
translation.it: L'FBI ha pubblicato queste immagini

translation.en: after conversations with guards at the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum.
translation.it: dopo aver parlato con le guardie del Gardner Museum.

translation.en: [reporter] Suspect number one is described as a white male in his early 30s,
translation.it: Il sospettato numero uno è un maschio bianco sui 30 anni,

translation.en: approximately 5'10" tall, 160 pounds,
translation.it: alto circa 178 cm , sui 72 kg,

translation.en: dark hair , and wearing gold wire-rim glasses.
translation.it: capelli scuri e occhiali dalla montatura dorata.

translation.en: Suspect number two is described as a white male in his early 30s also.
translation.it: Anche il sospettato numero due è un uomo bianco sui 30 anni.

translation.en: Approximately 6" tall with dark hair.
translation.it: Alto circa 183 cm, capelli scuri.

translation.en: I don't think the sketches was that reliable.
translation.it: Dubito che gli schizzi fossero affidabili.

translation.en: How long did they see them? Did they get a good look? Were they wearing fake mustaches?
translation.it: Erano davvero riusciti a guardarli bene? Indossavano baffi finti?

translation.en: Take a look at these composite drawings.
translation.it: Guardate questi identikit.

translation.en: They may, in a manner of speaking, be worth several hundred million dollars.
translation.it: Potrebbero, in un certo senso, valere centinaia di milioni di dollari.

translation.en: If, that is, they bear a striking resemblance to the two men who inspired them.
translation.it: Sempre che davvero somiglino agli uomini che li hanno ispirati.

translation.en: [Brekke] With something like this, we try to take a minute, step back and say,
translation.it: In casi del genere, ci si prende un attimo per pensare:

translation.en: "Okay, where do we go from here?"
translation.it: "Ok, adesso cosa facciamo?"

translation.en: This is not a crime of opportunity.
translation.it: Questo non fu un crimine improvvisato.

translation.en: These guys were not dressing up for Halloween in policeman's uniforms
translation.it: I ladri non si vestirono da poliziotti per festeggiare Halloween,

translation.en: saying, "Gee, a good idea, let's go rob the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum."
translation.it: per poi dire: "Ehi, perché non rapiniamo l'Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum?"

translation.en: You know, this was planned out.
translation.it: Era pianificato.

translation.en: [Robert Fisher] A lot of planning. They had duct tape, handcuffs, uniform on.
translation.it: Erano preparati. Avevano il nastro, le manette, le uniformi.

translation.en: They were ready to get in.
translation.it: Erano pronti a entrare.

translation.en: I've done organized crime cases for years.
translation.it: Mi occupo di crimine organizzato da anni.

translation.en: I've done wiretaps. I think I know how criminals think and act.
translation.it: Ho fatto molte intercettazioni, so come pensano e agiscono i criminali.

translation.en: -I don't think it was a cold call. -[door slams]
translation.it: Non improvvisarono.

translation.en: You analyze the 13 pieces that were stolen.
translation.it: Analizzando le 13 opere scomparse,

translation.en: It just seemed like they had either cased the place
translation.it: si capisce che avevano studiato il posto

translation.en: or given specific information about what to look for,
translation.it: o ricevuto informazioni specifiche su cosa cercare,

translation.en: what's on our shopping list.
translation.it: una lista della spesa.

translation.en: A finial off the Napoleonic flag?
translation.it: L'ornamento di una bandiera napoleonica?

translation.en: [Fisher] It's confounding.
translation.it: È strano.

translation.en: It's hard to figure out why you would, in a museum, with priceless pieces of art,
translation.it: È difficile immaginare perché, in un museo pieno d'arte inestimabile,

translation.en: waste precious time with this finial that is essentially worthless.
translation.it: abbiano perso tempo con un ornamento senza valore.

translation.en: [Brekke] They had taken a Chinese artifact.
translation.it: Poi c'era il manufatto cinese.

translation.en: [Fisher] A Chinese ku.
translation.it: Un Ku.

translation.en: It's old, it's somewhat valuable,
translation.it: È antico, di valore,

translation.en: but not even close to some of the other items of art just in that room.
translation.it: ma neanche lontanamente vicino ad altri pezzi in quella sala.

translation.en: Was the Chinese artifact a diversion?
translation.it: Forse il manufatto cinese era una distrazione?

translation.en: There was one self-portrait of Rembrandt where his eyes follow you around the room.
translation.it: C'era l'autoritratto di Rembrandt, i cui occhi sembrano seguirti.

translation.en: They tried to steal that and they took it down off the wall,
translation.it: Provarono a prenderlo, tirandolo giù dal muro,

translation.en: and for some reason, it was left behind.
translation.it: ma finirono per lasciarlo lì.

translation.en: And they don't know if it was just too big or they forgot it.
translation.it: Non è chiaro se fosse troppo grande o se lo dimenticarono.

translation.en: [Fisher] One thing that stuck out was the Rembrandt etching.
translation.it: Un'altra stranezza è l'incisione di Rembrandt.

translation.en: It's the size of a postage stamp. The frame isn't much bigger.
translation.it: Non era molto grande, e nemmeno la cornice.

translation.en: And yet somebody wasted time unscrewing that and then taking apart the whole frame
translation.it: Eppure persero tempo a svitare e smontare la cornice,

translation.en: and taking only the etching.
translation.it: prendendo solo l'incisione.

translation.en: Right, if you're carrying out the biggest heist in history
translation.it: Se steste commettendo il più grande furto della storia,

translation.en: and you dunno if the police are coming,
translation.it: senza sapere dove sia la polizia,

translation.en: and you have limited time to get valuable artwork,
translation.it: e doveste prendere le opere di maggior valore,

translation.en: are you gonna waste time with an etching that isn't that expensive, waste precious moments taking it out of a frame
translation.it: perdereste tempo a togliere dalla cornice un'incisione che non vale poi tanto,

translation.en: that you could stick in your pocket regardless?
translation.it: sapendo che vi entrerebbe comunque in tasca?

translation.en: I would say no.
translation.it: Io non credo.

translation.en: [Brekke] The paintings themselves,
translation.it: I dipinti in sé

translation.en: everybody knows about it so you can't sell 'em on the market.
translation.it: sono troppo noti e quindi non è possibile rivenderli,

translation.en: At least not on the open market.
translation.it: almeno non sul mercato aperto.

translation.en: Sold, 43 million.
translation.it: Venduto. Quarantatré milioni.

translation.en: [reporter] Even at a time when prices are setting records,
translation.it: Perfino in un'epoca di prezzi da record,

translation.en: dealers and curators say these paintings would be difficult to fence.
translation.it: piazzare quei dipinti sarebbe molto difficile.

translation.en: Many believe they were hired to steal what they took.
translation.it: Forse sono stati assunti appositamente.

translation.en: But unless they had a buyer already lined up,
translation.it: Ma se non avevano già un compratore,

translation.en: it may have been one of the dumber robberies in recent history.
translation.it: potrebbe essere stata una rapina davvero stupida.

translation.en: [reporter 2] Given that these pieces are well-known, who could possibly keep them?
translation.it: Dato che si tratta di opere molto note, chi mai potrebbe tenerle?

translation.en: That's a very good question.
translation.it: È un'ottima domanda.

translation.en: Only probably a person who is determined
translation.it: Probabilmente, soltanto una persona molto determinata

translation.en: to keep them private for the rest of their life.
translation.it: a tenerle nascoste per sempre.

translation.en: [reporter 1] Some masterpieces are so valuable, they may be too hot to sell.
translation.it: Alcuni capolavori sono così preziosi che sono impossibili da vendere.

translation.en: Which raises the question: were these thieves working for a collector?
translation.it: Il che fa pensare: i ladri lavoravano per un collezionista?

translation.en: [Brekke] The Storm on the Sea of Galilee
translation.it: Tempesta sul mare di Galilea

translation.en: is the only seascape that Rembrandt ever painted.
translation.it: è l'unico paesaggio marino dipinto da Rembrandt.

translation.en: Who is gonna have that in their living room?
translation.it: Chi se lo appenderebbe in salotto?

translation.en: We started speculating.
translation.it: Allora iniziarono le congetture.

translation.en: "Well, maybe it's a… oligarch in Russia, and he's got it in his basement
translation.it: "Forse è un oligarca in Russia, che se lo tiene in cantina

translation.en: and he goes down there and he looks at it."
translation.it: e ogni tanto va ad ammirarlo."

translation.en: You know, the only Rembrandt seascape in existence.
translation.it: e ogni tanto va ad ammirarlo." L'unico paesaggio marino di Rembrandt.

translation.en: A lot of people have speculated that it was a Dr. No theory.
translation.it: Molti ipotizzarono teorie che rimandavano al Dr. No.

translation.en: Some rich oil baron or billionaire wanted these particular items,
translation.it: Forse un magnate o un miliardario voleva quelle opere in particolare

translation.en: and they paid a crew to carry out the robbery.
translation.it: e pagò i ladri per rubarle.

translation.en: [Fisher] It's somebody probably looks like a villain from one of the Bond movies.
translation.it: Qualcuno che somiglia a un cattivo di James Bond.

translation.en: He's sitting there with his cognac
translation.it: Se ne sta seduto a bere cognac,

translation.en: and his trophy wife or girlfriend next to him
translation.it: accanto alla sua moglie trofeo,

translation.en: admiring the art that was stolen from the Gardner.
translation.it: ad ammirare le opere rubate dal Gardner Museum.

translation.en: I was the unwanted child of a German missionary
translation.it: Sono il figlio non voluto di un missionario tedesco

translation.en: and a Chinese girl of good family.
translation.it: e una ragazza cinese di buona famiglia.

translation.en: Any thought that these paintings
translation.it: L'idea che quei dipinti siano nelle mani di un cattivo da film…

translation.en: are hung on the walls of Mr. Big
translation.it: L'idea che quei dipinti siano nelle mani di un cattivo da film… EX CAPO DELLA SQUADRA ARTE E ANTICHITÀ

translation.en: who has them stolen to order is utter rubbish.
translation.it: …che ne ha ordinato il furto è ridicola.

translation.en: The problem with your Dr. No theory…
translation.it: Il problema della teoria del Dr. No

translation.en: is that as soon as he's commissioned it,
translation.it: è che, appena ordinato il furto,

translation.en: and the thieves see there's, in the case of the Gardner Museum,
translation.it: i ladri si rendono conto che, nel caso del Gardner Museum,

translation.en: a reward for information leading to the recovery,
translation.it: c'è una ricompensa per il ritrovamento.

translation.en: what are they gonna do? They're gonna cash in.
translation.it: E che fanno? La incassano.

translation.en: They're gonna set the guy up and get their reward.
translation.it: Incastrano l'acquirente e si prendono la ricompensa.

translation.en: [chuckles] No. Dr. Nos and so on don't exist.
translation.it: No. Non esiste alcun Dr. No.

translation.en: You get some very professional criminals.
translation.it: Alcuni criminali sono veri professionisti.

translation.en: But they don't know how to handle art, what to do with art.
translation.it: Ma non sanno come trattare l'arte, cosa farne.

translation.en: And that's usually their undoing.
translation.it: Il che è la loro rovina.

translation.en: Where you've got a professional art thief, the theft is professional, it's skilled.
translation.it: Con i ladri d'arte professionisti, il furto è professionale, ben fatto.

translation.en: The artwork has been taken because they know how they're gonna dispose of it.
translation.it: Le opere vengono rubate perché sanno già come disfarsene.

translation.en: That's when you've got a problem.
translation.it: Allora nasce il problema.

translation.en: My name is Steven George Xiarhos.
translation.it: Mi chiamo Steven George Xiarhos.

translation.en: I'm the deputy chief of police here in Yarmouth.
translation.it: Sono il vicecapo della polizia di Yarmouth.

translation.en: Yarmouth is historic, quaint, quiet.
translation.it: Yarmouth è una città storica, pittoresca, tranquilla.

translation.en: And, looking back, a good place to commit a crime.
translation.it: E, ripensandoci, un buon posto per commettere un crimine.

translation.en: So, in '88, I get called out to this scene.
translation.it: Nell'88 mi chiesero di recarmi su una scena del crimine.

translation.en: Pulling up to this beautiful museum, the Bangs Hallet House,
translation.it: Arrivato in questo bellissimo museo, la Bangs Hallet House,

translation.en: and seeing the immediate aftermath of a really serious crime.
translation.it: osservai le conseguenze di un crimine davvero grave.

translation.en: They went in the back door, they overpowered the caretaker,
translation.it: Entrarono dalla porta sul retro, neutralizzarono la custode,

translation.en: tied her up, taped her mouth shut, her eyes,
translation.it: la legarono, imbavagliarono, le coprirono gli occhi,

translation.en: then stole all of these items.
translation.it: e rubarono moltissimi oggetti.

translation.en: They knew what they were looking for,
translation.it: VASO CINESE DEL XIII SECOLO 200 PEZZI INTAGLIATI Sapevano cosa cercare, erano già stati lì

translation.en: they had been inside,
translation.it: Sapevano cosa cercare, erano già stati lì

translation.en: and they were very successful.
translation.it: e riuscirono a farcela.

translation.en: And then disappeared.
translation.it: Poi scomparvero.

translation.en: So you start putting pieces together. You work with local police,
translation.it: Così iniziammo a indagare. Collaborammo con la polizia locale, la polizia statale e poi quella federale.

translation.en: and then state police, and then federal.
translation.it: Collaborammo con la polizia locale, la polizia statale e poi quella federale.

translation.en: And through all that, that name came up, this man named Myles Connor.
translation.it: In tutto ciò, venne fuori il nome di Myles Connor.

translation.en: [reporter 1] Myles Connor, a legendary outlaw from Massachusetts.
translation.it: Myles Connor, leggendario fuorilegge del Massachusetts.

translation.en: [reporter 2] In 1975, he stole a Rembrandt from the Museum of Fine Arts.
translation.it: Nel 1975, rubò un Rembrandt dal Museum of Fine Arts.

translation.en: [man] I first met him, I believe it was in Mattapan Square,
translation.it: Lo incontrai per la prima volta a Mattapan Square,

translation.en: when he had either a cougar or a mountain lion on a leash.
translation.it: mentre teneva al guinzaglio un puma o un leone di montagna.

translation.en: I said, "That's Myles Connor." And I introduced myself.
translation.it: Capii che era lui e mi presentai. AVVOCATO PENALISTA

translation.en: And I followed his career.
translation.it: Seguii la sua carriera.

translation.en: And then got to represent him.
translation.it: E poi diventai il suo avvocato.

translation.en: Myles was the man.
translation.it: Myles aveva fascino.

translation.en: He could play the guitar and sing.
translation.it: Suonava la chitarra e cantava.

translation.en: And he put on a great show.
translation.it: Faceva dei grandi spettacoli.

translation.en: He might've been really a big star,
translation.it: IL PRESIDENTE DEL ROCK & ROLL Sarebbe potuto diventare una star,

translation.en: but everything always was interrupted by his other activities.
translation.it: ma si lasciava sempre distrarre dalle sue altre attività.

translation.en: Myles Connor. Yeah. He did a show at the…
translation.it: Myles Connor. Si esibì al…

translation.en: -[man] The Beachcomber? -Yeah, exactly that.
translation.it: - Al Beachcomber? - Sì, esatto.

translation.en: My wife in her younger days would go there
translation.it: Da giovane, mia moglie ci andava

translation.en: with her sisters and a few friends and see his shows.
translation.it: con le sorelle e le amiche per vederlo suonare.

translation.en: He was a robber, a thief…
translation.it: Era un rapinatore, un ladro…

translation.en: a killer.
translation.it: e un assassino.

translation.en: [Myles Connor Jr.] Depends upon whom you ask,
translation.it: Dipende a chi lo si chiede,

translation.en: but in general, I'm known as an art thief.
translation.it: ma, in generale, sono noto come ladro d'arte.

translation.en: And some people…
translation.it: E alcuni…

translation.en: consider me the biggest art thief in this country
translation.it: …mi considerano il miglior ladro d'arte del paese,

translation.en: because I've robbed a number of museums.
translation.it: perché ho rapinato diversi musei.

translation.en: But then again, I was a rock and roll guy.
translation.it: Ma, più di tutto, ero un patito di rock and roll.

translation.en: [Leppo] Myles Joseph Connor Jr.
translation.it: Myles Joseph Connor Jr.

translation.en: His father was a police officer,
translation.it: Suo padre era un poliziotto,

translation.en: his step-brother was a state police officer,
translation.it: il fratellastro lavorava nella polizia di stato

translation.en: his other brother is a priest.
translation.it: e il suo altro fratello era un prete.

translation.en: His favorite line was, "Where did they go wrong?"
translation.it: A lui piaceva dire: "Dove hanno sbagliato?"

translation.en: He was a criminal.
translation.it: Era un criminale.

translation.en: He was this 5'7", 5'8" guy with this booming voice.
translation.it: Era alto circa 175 cm e aveva questa voce potente.

translation.en: He was a member of Mensa, he was like, brilliant.
translation.it: Era membro del Mensa, era geniale.

translation.en: [man] He has a doctor's knowledge of human anatomy, and is a student of Eastern philosophy.
translation.it: Conosce l'anatomia umana quanto un medico e studia le filosofie orientali.

translation.en: [Murphty] He was always pulling off crazy capers and getting into trouble.
translation.it: Ne combinava di tutti i colori e si cacciava sempre nei guai.

translation.en: Anybody in law enforcement that hears my name,
translation.it: Credo che le forze dell'ordine

translation.en: I'm sure must think that I'm running second neck-to-neck to Attila the Hun.
translation.it: mi considerino quasi al pari di Attila l'unno.

translation.en: [Murphy] He robbed museums up in Maine, he had shootouts with police.
translation.it: Aveva rapinato musei nel Maine, fatto sparatorie con la polizia.

translation.en: Myles was shot three, four, five times at once.
translation.it: Una volta gli spararono quattro, cinque volte.

translation.en: And went through surgery without anesthesia.
translation.it: Subì l'intervento senza anestesia.

translation.en: [Murphy] He was the definition, the quintessential art thief.
translation.it: Era il ladro d'arte per antonomasia. RESTITUZIONE DI UN REMBRANDT

translation.en: [Xiarhos] When this crime happened in Yarmouth,
translation.it: Quando si verificò questo crimine a Yarmouth,

translation.en: we tried to find him.
translation.it: andammo a cercarlo.

translation.en: One day, I'm in my office and I get a phone call.
translation.it: Un giorno, ricevetti una chiamata in ufficio.

translation.en: "Detective, I heard you were looking for me. My name is Myles Connor."
translation.it: "Detective, so che mi state cercando. Sono Myles Connor."

translation.en: He said, "Yes, that's my thing,
translation.it: Disse: "È vero, sarebbe una cosa da me,

translation.en: but I want you to know I had nothing to do with this."
translation.it: ma voglio farvi sapere che non sono stato io".

translation.en: No one really saw anything,
translation.it: Nessuno aveva visto niente,

translation.en: but the cop in me wants to lock him up.
translation.it: ma il poliziotto in me voleva arrestarlo.

translation.en: [Connor] Take a peek here if you want to.
translation.it: Guardate qui, se volete.

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine.
translation.it: Uno, due, tre, quattro, cinque, sei, sette, otto, nove.

translation.en: No, I think that's wrong. Actually 11 to 12. [laughs]
translation.it: No, i conti non tornano. Credo siano 11 o 12.

translation.en: You lose count.
translation.it: Ho perso il conto.

translation.en: When the Gardner Museum happened, yeah, we thought back to this.
translation.it: Dopo il furto al Gardner Museum, riesaminammo la questione.

translation.en: It wasn't too long after, you know.
translation.it: Non era passato molto tempo.

translation.en: Whoever did this, that's their world.
translation.it: Chiunque sia stato, è il loro mondo.

translation.en: Art theft.
translation.it: Il furto d'arte.

translation.en: It's not like breaking into a house and stealing a TV.
translation.it: Non è come entrare in una casa e rubare una TV.

translation.en: This is different.
translation.it: È diverso.

translation.en: Whoever did this and Gardner, in my opinion, may be connected.
translation.it: Il furto avvenuto qui e quello al Gardner, secondo me, potrebbero essere collegati.

translation.en: They absolutely have done it before, they probably did it again,
translation.it: Di certo l'avevano già fatto prima, e probabilmente anche dopo.

translation.en: and that's professional thieves.
translation.it: Sono ladri professionisti.

translation.en: [man] How many art heists have you done?
translation.it: Quanti furti d'arte hai commesso?

translation.en: [Connor] Probably 30. Thirty-plus.
translation.it: Forse 30 o più.

translation.en: [man] How many did the authorities know about?
translation.it: Quanti sono stati scoperti?

translation.en: [Connor] Very little.
translation.it: Molto pochi.

translation.en: He was so well-prepared to do something.
translation.it: Si preparava sempre molto bene.

translation.en: You just don't go into a museum…
translation.it: Non si entra in un museo

translation.en: and decide to take a painting.
translation.it: e si decide di prendere un quadro.

translation.en: It's the getaway that's the big thing here.
translation.it: È la fuga la cosa più importante.

translation.en: And Myles was a great escape artist.
translation.it: E Myles era un artista della fuga.

translation.en: He had always said, not necessarily to me,
translation.it: Diceva sempre, non necessariamente a me,

translation.en: that the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum, that that was on his bucket list.
translation.it: che l'Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum era sulla sua lista dei desideri.

translation.en: Any reasonable person on the planet would assume that you masterminded it from the beginning.
translation.it: Qualunque persona ragionevole penserebbe che ci sia tu, dietro a tutto.

translation.en: Myles Connor, the biggest art thief in the city.
translation.it: Myles Connor, il più grande ladro d'arte in città.

translation.en: He would be suspect number one.
translation.it: Il sospettato numero uno.

translation.en: If he wasn't in jail at the time that this happened…
translation.it: Se all'epoca non fosse stato in prigione…

translation.en: On the day of the robbery of the Gardner Museum, I was in federal custody.
translation.it: Il giorno della rapina al Gardner Museum, ero in custodia federale.

translation.en: [man] The FBI nailed him in a sting involving art he'd stolen years before.
translation.it: L'FBI l'aveva preso durante una retata legata a opere rubate anni prima.

translation.en: The judge gave him 11 years.
translation.it: Gli diedero 11 anni.

translation.en: Which means that when the Gardner was hit in 1990,
translation.it: Quindi, quando il Garder fu derubato nel 1990,

translation.en: the master thief Myles Connor was behind bars.
translation.it: il grande ladro Myles Connor era dietro le sbarre.

translation.en: But there's a saying that the guards came
translation.it: Gira una voce secondo cui le guardie

translation.en: and knocked on my cell door to make sure I was there.
translation.it: bussarono alla mia cella per assicurarsi che fossi lì.

translation.en: But I think that's more legend than it is fact.
translation.it: Ma credo che sia più che altro una leggenda.

translation.en: [Murphy] I think there was a feeling that somehow this would shake out fairly quickly.
translation.it: Credo che la gente si aspettasse che la cosa venisse risolta in fretta.

translation.en: And then as time dragged on,
translation.it: Poi, col passare del tempo,

translation.en: they realized this stuff was just way too hot to handle,
translation.it: capirono che le opere in questione scottavano troppo

translation.en: that it was gonna take some time.
translation.it: e che ci sarebbe voluto tempo.

translation.en: [Fisher] I started in Public Corruption March of 2010.
translation.it: Iniziai a lavorare nell'anticorruzione nel marzo 2010.

translation.en: My first week was the 20th anniversary.
translation.it: Era il 20° anniversario del caso.

translation.en: It was a cold case, it was 20 years old,
translation.it: Era un caso irrisolto di 20 anni prima,

translation.en: so I took time going back through, looking at other angles.
translation.it: quindi cercai di riesaminarlo da un'altra prospettiva.

translation.en: I wanna take this through step by step how it happened.
translation.it: Volevo ripercorrere tutto passo per passo.

translation.en: Not only minute by minute, but second by second.
translation.it: Non minuto per minuto, ma ogni secondo.

translation.en: How did this thing play out?
translation.it: Come andarono le cose?

translation.en: And how many things had to go right for these two robbers to still not be caught?
translation.it: E quanti fattori permisero ai ladri di non venire catturati?

translation.en: [Murphy] What we know is that 23-year-old Richard Abath,
translation.it: Sappiamo che il ventitreenne Richard Abath,

translation.en: sort of a music school dropout,
translation.it: che aveva abbandonato la scuola di musica,

translation.en: is on duty that night.
translation.it: era in servizio quella sera.

translation.en: Maybe around midnight or so,
translation.it: Intorno a mezzanotte… CHIOSTRO OVEST

translation.en: Rick Abath takes the first shift to do the rounds upstairs.
translation.it: …Abath fece il primo giro di ronda ai piani superiori.

translation.en: He says there were fire alarms going off,
translation.it: Disse che era scattato l'allarme antincendio…

translation.en: and that he ends up shutting off the fire alarm.
translation.it: ORE 00:45 …e che lui andò a spegnerlo.

translation.en: He comes down and relieves the other guard at the desk.
translation.it: Poi scese per dare il cambio alla guardia alla scrivania.

translation.en: But what he does is he opens the outside door
translation.it: Ma prima aprì la porta esterna

translation.en: and shuts it about 10 minutes before the thieves show up.
translation.it: e la richiuse circa 10 minuti prima dell'arrivo dei ladri.

translation.en: [Fisher] The first thing we know is that outside door that they entered through
translation.it: La prima cosa che sappiamo è che la porta esterna da cui passarono

translation.en: was open 15, 20 minutes before they enter it.
translation.it: era aperta 15 o 20 minuti prima del loro arrivo.

translation.en: Why?
translation.it: Perché?

translation.en: [Murphy] So, now at 1:24 a.m.,
translation.it: Quindi, all'1:24 del mattino,

translation.en: two men dressed as police officers show up at the door.
translation.it: due presunti poliziotti si presentarono alla porta.

translation.en: They say they're there to investigate a disturbance.
translation.it: Affermarono di indagare su un problema.

translation.en: Rick Abath says he buzzed the door and let them in.
translation.it: Rick Abath aprì loro la porta.

translation.en: They say, "I might have a warrant for your arrest. Step away from the desk."
translation.it: Dissero di doverlo arrestare e di allontanarsi dalla scrivania.

translation.en: Now he's removed himself from the only place where he can get help from the outside.
translation.it: Quindi si allontanò dall'unico posto da cui avrebbe potuto chiedere aiuto.

translation.en: There's a button that will alert Boston Police that there's a problem at the museum.
translation.it: C'è un pulsante per chiamare la polizia in caso di problemi al museo.

translation.en: And now the thieves spend 81 minutes in the museum, helping themselves.
translation.it: Poi i ladri passarono 81 minuti nel museo a fare i propri comodi.

translation.en: [Fisher] Ten minutes in a robbery seems like an eternity.
translation.it: In una rapina, dieci minuti sono un'eternità.

translation.en: That's what has always stood out for me,
translation.it: È quello che mi ha sempre colpito,

translation.en: the fact they were comfortable enough to be in there for 81 minutes.
translation.it: quanto si sentissero sicuri nel rimanere per 81 minuti.

translation.en: That's an incredibly long time to spend
translation.it: È molto tempo da passare

translation.en: when you have people tied up and you don't know if police are coming.
translation.it: con degli ostaggi legati, senza sapere se la polizia è in arrivo.

translation.en: [Murphy] Another peculiar thing.
translation.it: Un'altra stranezza

translation.en: In the Dutch Room, there was a secret panel.
translation.it: è che nella Sala Olandese c'era un pannello nascosto.

translation.en: There's a door that leads downstairs, and it was slightly ajar
translation.it: C'è una porta che conduce di sotto ed era leggermente socchiusa quando i detective arrivarono.

translation.en: when the investigators arrived that morning.
translation.it: ed era leggermente socchiusa quando i detective arrivarono.

translation.en: Which also raised the question, who'd know there was a door?
translation.it: Il che solleva la domanda, chi sapeva della porta?

translation.en: [Fisher] There were security cameras,
translation.it: Le telecamere funzionavano,

translation.en: but the thieves knew where the VHS system was, so they took tape from that evening.
translation.it: ma i ladri sapevano dov'era il sistema e presero i nastri di quel giorno.

translation.en: We know that at least one of the proximity detectors went off.
translation.it: Sappiamo che scattò almeno un rilevatore di prossimità.

translation.en: I think the Rembrandt.
translation.it: Credo per il Rembrandt.

translation.en: If an alarm like that goes off,
translation.it: Quando scatta un allarme,

translation.en: typically they get out of there, in case that alerted somebody.
translation.it: generalmente i ladri scappano, nel caso arrivi qualcuno.

translation.en: But these thieves didn't.
translation.it: Non stavolta.

translation.en: I don't see how this was pulled off without inside information.
translation.it: Non vedo come sia stato possibile senza avere informazioni dall'interno.

translation.en: My understanding is at the guard desk, there was an old printer there
translation.it: Alla scrivania delle guardie c'era una vecchia stampante

translation.en: that prints out the motion detector alarms.
translation.it: che stampava gli allarmi dei sensori di movimento.

translation.en: Somebody took that. They took the printout, the paper.
translation.it: Qualcuno prese le stampe, la carta.

translation.en: But it was 1990, so they probably didn't realize
translation.it: Ma era il 1990 e forse non sapevano

translation.en: that there was a hard drive somewhere… that had the data.
translation.it: che da qualche parte c'era un disco rigido con tutti i dati. QUALCUNO NELLA SALA OLANDESE INDAGARE SUBITO

translation.en: [Murphy] The most peculiar thing about what happened during those 81 minutes
translation.it: La cosa più strana di quanto accadde in quegli 81 minuti

translation.en: is that most of the stolen artwork was taken from the Dutch Room.
translation.it: è che la maggior parte delle opere fu presa dalla Sala Olandese.

translation.en: There were also some items taken from the Short Gallery.
translation.it: Alcuni oggetti furono presi dalla Galleria Piccola.

translation.en: The Chez Tortoni is the only piece that was stolen on the first floor,
translation.it: Da Tortoni è l'unico pezzo rubato dal primo piano,

translation.en: from the Blue Room.
translation.it: nella Sala Blu.

translation.en: And the only person that the hard drive can show
translation.it: E l'unica persona che, secondo il disco rigido,

translation.en: whose steps went into that room…
translation.it: entrò in quella stanza…

translation.en: …were those of Richard Abath…
translation.it: era Richard Abath. ORE 00:27

translation.en: when he was doing his rounds in the museum.
translation.it: Durante la sua ronda nel museo.

translation.en: [Fisher] Best we can tell in the data, they never entered that room.
translation.it: Secondo i dati, i ladri non vi entrarono mai.

translation.en: So, that means somebody either took it off the wall before…
translation.it: Quindi qualcuno tolse i quadri dalla parete prima

translation.en: or after the police got there.
translation.it: o dopo l'arrivo della polizia.

translation.en: ♪ I know ♪
translation.it: Io so

translation.en: ♪ Something about ♪
translation.it: Una cosa o due

translation.en: ♪ Opening windows and doors ♪
translation.it: Su come aprire porte e finestre

translation.en: I think it happened before the robbery.
translation.it: Credo sia accaduto prima della rapina.

translation.en: ♪ I know ♪
translation.it: Io so

translation.en: ♪ How to move quietly ♪
translation.it: Come muovermi silenziosamente

translation.en: ♪ To creep across creaky wooden floors ♪
translation.it: E strisciare sui pavimenti scricchiolanti

translation.en: Number one, you've gotta look at the inner circle.
translation.it: Per prima cosa, bisogna cercare nella cerchia interna.

translation.en: ♪ I know ♪
translation.it: Io so

translation.en: ♪ Where to find precious things ♪
translation.it: Dove trovare cose preziose

translation.en: ♪ In all your cupboards and drawers ♪
translation.it: In credenze e cassetti

translation.en: [Murphy] Looking at it through today's lens, the question is,
translation.it: Ripensandoci adesso, la domanda è:

translation.en: "Whoa, why wasn't there immediately a lot of focus on Richard Abath?"
translation.it: Ripensandoci adesso, la domanda è: "Perché non ci si concentrò subito su Richard Abath?"

translation.en: [Abath] Once I sat down with the FBI,
translation.it: Quando mi sedetti con l'FBI,

translation.en: I… I knew.
translation.it: lo sapevo.

translation.en: I was like, "I'm the guy who opened up the door. They're gonna be looking at me."
translation.it: Pensavo: "Sono io che ho aperto la porta. Ovviamente sospetteranno di me".
